translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Book of the Middle Length Discourses

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.53. Sanidassanattika, Sanidassanaduka🔽Sanidassanasappaṭigho nasanidassano dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa nidassana ttika sa nidassana duka  sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sa paṭighassa na sa nidassanassa
translated: The Book of the Conditional Relations in Triads

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi,
analyzed: dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitte ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi
translated: A visible object that is a condition, as the support condition, for a visible object that is a non-adverting object, a visible object that is a non-adverting object is related to a visible object that is a non-adverting object as the support condition. (Abbreviated.) In the object, there are three; in the dominant, there are three;
in the prenascence, there are three; in the presence, there are three.

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham anidassanam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: A non-visible object that is a condition, as the root-cause condition, for a non-visible object that is a non-adverting object, a non-visible object that is a non-adverting object is related to a non-visible object that is a non-adverting object as the root-cause condition. (Abbreviated.) In the root-cause, there are nine; in the dominant, there are nine; … in the presence, there are nine; in the absence, there are nine; in the dissociation, there are nine; in the disassociation, there are nine; in the nutrition, there are nine; in the cleansing, there are nine; in the path, there are nine; in the fruition, there are nine; in the development, there are nine; in the non-development, there are nine; in the past, there are nine; in the future, there are nine; in the present, there are nine; in the unarisen, there are nine; in the arisen, there are nine; in the arousing, there are nine; in the unarising, there are nine; in the past origination, there are nine; in the future origination, there are nine; in the present origination, there are nine; in the not-yet-arisen, there are nine; in the arisen, there are nine; in the past cessation, there are nine; in the future cessation, there are nine; in the present cessation, there are nine; in the not-yet-arisen, there are nine; in the arisen, there are nine; in the past, there are nine; in the future, there are nine; in the present, there are nine; in the not-yet-arisen, there are nine; in the arisen, there are nine; in the arousing
